data.name: Bullet Time
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT MORE GAMES FROM US

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1464730/Metal_Commando/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1482710/Samurai_Revenge/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1439180/Elite_Commander/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1366840/Moon_Farming/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1355970/Jungle_House/

Bullet Time is the new shooting fun game. Mafia took your dog and you are coming for a big revenge! Use only one bullet and one shot to kill them all. Are you ready to test your shooting skills with one shot ONLY?

Features:

⚈ Beautiful graphics
⚈ Make one aimed shot and control the bullet to neutralize mafia enemies!
⚈ Destroy all enemies and save your lovely dog from them.
⚈ Customize your character, dress him in the store and show what a cool look.
⚈ Large selection of levels at the top of the modern city.
⚈ And many more...

data.short_description: Bullet Time is the new shooting fun game. Mafia took your dog and you are coming for a big revenge! Use only one bullet and one shot to kill them all. Are you ready to test your shooting skills with one shot ONLY?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Pentium
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game is showing cartoon shooting and violence
